featured.text: In 1977, he bought a piece of rocky wasteland with the 32 of growing trees on it.

definition.zh_def: 荒地；無用的土地或地區，通常缺乏植被或生物。
definition.en_def: An area of land that is barren or desolate, often lacking vegetation or wildlife.
definition.example: The abandoned factory was surrounded by a vast wasteland.
